price: Ampa sε, wͻbͻͻ wͻn pͻ a wͻbͻeε, na pͻ a wͻbͻeε no wͻ Nyankopͻn hͻ; na nokorε sε, wͻbͻͻ pͻ bͻne sεdeε emu no mpo mmepͻ betutuo.
arabic: وَقَدۡ مَكَرُواْ مَكۡرَهُمۡ وَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ مَكۡرُهُمۡ وَإِن كَانَ مَكۡرُهُمۡ لِتَزُولَ مِنۡهُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqad makarū makrahum waʿinda al-lahi makruhum wa-in kāna makruhum litazūla min'hu al-jibālu
